column4: How do you boot the CD and disable framebuffer for the install process?
the options listed on the CD aren't working, or I'm getting the syntax wrong :/
the help (f1) tells you. sth with framebuffer=false
do you pass that arg after 'linux' ?  i.e. linux framebuffer=false?
I had to because the fb just gave me a black screen
please read the help. I dont remember exactly
just read the help it says how
well it did here. I think you must have done it wrong
passing that line at boot: gives me an error
don't you need a space there somewhere?
linux debian-installer/framebuffer=false did the trick.  Thanks dude.
